faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Common questions and answers about X-Lab AI.

questions.q: What languages does X-Lab AI support?
questions.a: X-Lab AI supports Cantonese, Mandarin, English, and many other languages. The system automatically detects the language and generates accurate subtitles, with support for both Traditional and Simplified Chinese output.

questions.q: Is my data uploaded to servers?
questions.a: No. X-Lab AI runs completely offline. All video and audio files are processed locally on your device and are never uploaded to any server, ensuring your data privacy and security.
X-Lab AI supports common video formats like MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, as well as audio formats like MP3, WAV, M4A, and more. Subtitles can be exported in SRT, VTT, and other formats.

questions.q: What are the limitations of the free version?
questions.a: The free version provides basic features including subtitle generation and export. Upgrade to Premium to unlock unlimited exports, priority processing speed, and more advanced features.

questions.q: How can I get technical support?
questions.a: You can contact us through the form on our Contact page or email hello@x-lab.ai. We will respond to your inquiry within one business day.

sections.title: 1. Overview
sections.content: X-Lab deeply understands the importance of personal privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy is designed to help you understand how we collect, use, store, and protect your information, as well as what rights you have. We are committed to handling your personal data in a transparent and responsible manner, in compliance with Hong Kong's Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance and other applicable data protection laws. By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this privacy policy. We recommend that you read this policy carefully, and if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.

sections.title: 2. Offline-First Approach
sections.content: X-Lab's core products adopt an "offline-first" design philosophy, which is our key strategy for protecting user privacy. Our products X-Caption and X-Minutes run entirely on your local device, which means your videos, audio files, generated subtitles, and meeting transcripts never leave your device or are uploaded to any cloud server. All AI processing, including speech recognition, language conversion, and text generation, is done locally on your computer. This architecture ensures that you have complete control over sensitive content, eliminating the risk of data being intercepted during transmission or unauthorized access on remote servers. Even if your device is not connected to the Internet, our products can function normally.

sections.title: 3. Information We Collect
sections.content: Although our core functionality runs entirely offline, we may collect limited information to provide a better service experience. This information includes: Account information, such as your email address, used for account creation, authentication, and important notifications; Device information, such as device type, operating system version, and unique device identifiers, used to optimize software performance and compatibility; Usage statistics, such as feature usage frequency and application crash reports (this data is anonymous and does not contain any personally identifiable information), used to improve products and fix issues; Support communications, such as information you send to us through contact forms or email, used to respond to your inquiries and provide technical support; Payment information, if you purchase a paid version, our payment processor will handle your payment information, and we do not directly store your credit card or bank account details.

sections.title: 4. Information We Don't Collect
sections.content: To clearly demonstrate our commitment to privacy, the following are types of information we explicitly do not collect, store, or access: any content of video or audio files you process; any subtitles, transcripts, or meeting notes generated using our products; any other media content or files on your device; your browsing history, search records, or other online activities; your geographic location or mobile data; contacts, calendar, or other personal application data on your device. Our products are designed with a data minimization principle — we only collect data that is absolutely necessary to provide you with services, and nothing more.

sections.title: 5. How We Use Information
sections.content: The limited information we collect is used only for the following specific purposes: providing, maintaining, and improving our services to ensure software stability and performance; processing your account registration, authentication, and authorization management; responding to your customer support requests and technical issues; sending important service notifications, such as security updates, feature changes, or account-related information; analyzing anonymous usage trends to improve product functionality and user experience; complying with legal obligations and protecting X-Lab's legitimate interests. We do not sell your personal data to third parties, nor do we use it for any purposes unrelated to those described above. We regularly review our data collection and usage practices to ensure they comply with this policy and applicable laws.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: X-Lab employs multi-layered technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, modification, or disclosure. These measures include: using industry-standard encryption technology (such as TLS/SSL) to protect data transmission; implementing strict access controls to ensure that only authorized personnel can access user data; regularly conducting security audits and vulnerability assessments; using secure cloud infrastructure (only for non-sensitive data); and providing employees with data protection and security awareness training. However, please note that no method of Internet transmission or electronic storage is completely secure. While we strive to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have reason to believe that your interaction with us is no longer secure, please notify us immediately through the contact information at the bottom of this policy.

sections.title: 7. Third-Party Services
sections.content: To provide better services, we may use certain third-party service providers. These providers only access your personal data when necessary to perform specific functions on our behalf, and are obligated not to disclose or use it for other purposes. Third-party services we use may include: payment processing services, used to process purchase transactions for paid versions; analytics services, used to collect anonymous usage statistics to improve our products; email service providers, used to send important service notifications. Each third-party service provider has its own privacy policy governing how they use your information. We encourage you to review these policies. We carefully select third-party partners and require them to maintain appropriate data protection measures.

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
sections.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have certain rights regarding your personal data. These rights may include: Right of access — you have the right to request confirmation of whether we process your personal data and to obtain a copy of such data; Right to rectification — you have the right to request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal data; Right to erasure — in certain circumstances, you have the right to request deletion of your personal data; Right to restrict processing — in certain circumstances, you have the right to request restriction of processing of your personal data; Right to data portability — you have the right to obtain your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format; Right to object — you have the right to object to processing of your personal data in certain circumstances; Right to withdraw consent — if processing is based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw that consent at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the contact information at the bottom of this policy. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe.

sections.title: 9. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: Our website uses limited cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help websites remember your preference settings. The types of cookies we use include: Essential cookies, which are necessary for the website to function properly, such as remembering your language preference or login status; Functional cookies, which help us remember your choices to provide a more personalized experience. We do not use any third-party tracking cookies, advertising cookies, or social media trackers. You can manage or delete cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website. Our desktop applications do not use cookies.

sections.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. When we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you by posting the updated policy on our website, by email notification, or through in-app notifications. The updated policy will take effect upon posting unless otherwise stated. We encourage you to regularly review this policy to understand how we protect your data. The "Last Updated" date at the top of this page indicates when this policy was last revised. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the modified privacy policy.

sections.title: 11. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about this privacy policy, or wish to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us at: hello@x-lab.hk. Our data protection team will carefully handle each inquiry and respond to your request as soon as possible, usually within two business days. We are committed to handling your personal data in a transparent and responsible manner, and welcome your feedback to help us continuously improve our privacy practices.
